import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Victor from './Victor.png' import axios from 'axios' export const Connexion = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState() const [password, setPassword] = useState() const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:3000/api/products/login', { email, password }) .then(result => { console.log(result.data); navigate('/dashboard'); // Redirigez vers une route valide après connexion }) .catch(err => console.error('Error logging in:', err)); }; return (
